message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the opportunity to purchase this valuable product from me. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1,400,000. This is a competitive price considering its worth to you is $1,500,000. I'm open to negotiations, but I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I agree this product would be valuable to my business, but I'm hoping we can agree on a slightly lower price.  Would you consider selling for $1,200,000?

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1,200,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $1,300,000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you. Let me know if this is something you're interested in.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway.  While $1,300,000 is closer to what I had in mind, I'm still hoping to land a bit lower. Would you be open to $1,250,000?

I understand you're still looking to negotiate, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $1,275,000. This is already a very competitive price considering the product's value to you. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'm open to discussing the terms of the sale.
